messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Former Homeschooler in the News!
messages.msgSnippet:
How wonderful and inspiring.  Thanks for sharing your daughter s wonderful
accomplishments. Lesa ... From: jbpainting2@comcast.net Date: 03/06/06 21:16:41 To:
messages.messageBody:
How wonderful and inspiring. Thanks for sharing your daughter's wonderful
accomplishments.

Lesa



-------Original Message-------

From: jbpainting2@...
Date: 03/06/06 21:16:41
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Former Homeschooler in the News!


Hi Family and Friends,

I just wanted to pass on this link to an article on our daughter, Rebekah,
who just won the Northeast Regional Debate Championship held last Saturday
at Bristol Community College. For those that don't know Rebekah, she was
homeschooled from age 9 until she was 16 when she entered BCC to study
American Sign Language and Deaf Culture. We are very proud of her and
wanted to pass on this great article!! Thank you!

http://www.tauntongazette.com/site/news
cfm?newsid=16246343&BRD=1711&PAG=461&dept_id=24232&rfi=6



Jack and Michelle

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Former Homeschooler in the News!
messages.msgSnippet: Melissa, I completely agree with you!!  The ability to argue one s side of an issue always begins young in our house.  Working out your problems or ideas with
messages.messageBody:
Melissa,
I completely agree with you!! The ability to argue one's side of an issue always begins young in our house. Working out your problems or ideas with siblings in a well thought out manner is always better than resorting to other means of getting your way. Respectfully listening to one another is a great life lesson....and one that Rebekah has done really well with!!! Even without a set curriculum!!!!
Thank you for your kind response!
Jack, Michelle, Rebekah (17), Stacia (15), Victoria (12), Gianna (8)!

-------------- Original message --------------
From: Melissa <autismhelp@...>
Awesome! Great article too, I esp like how it reflects that a genuine
child temperament, like arguing, is actually a great talent with lots
of potential! congratulations!
Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose

messages.msgSnippet: Hi Family and Friends, I just wanted to pass on this link to an article on our daughter, Rebekah, who just won the Northeast Regional Debate Championship held
messages.messageBody:
Hi Family and Friends,

I just wanted to pass on this link to an article on our daughter, Rebekah, who just won the Northeast Regional Debate Championship held last Saturday at Bristol Community College. For those that don't know Rebekah, she was homeschooled from age 9 until she was 16 when she entered BCC to study American Sign Language and Deaf Culture. We are very proud of her and wanted to pass on this great article!! Thank you!

http://www.tauntongazette.com/site/news.cfm?newsid=16246343&BRD=1711&PAG=461&dept_id=24232&rfi=6



Jack and Michelle
